name: Forest Fighter
description:
Forest Fighter is an academic project heavily inspired by Gameboy Zelda and Pokemon games.  It is a 3rd person overhead puzzle solving game where the player must combine tools with nature to save the forest  from fires! The game follows the main character,  Arko who must figure out how to cleanse the forest of fires before his lungs give out!

TEAM

Forest Fighter was created by a team of 5 university students at SAE Qantm, Melbourne.

Duy Tran - Creative Lead/Programmer

Blake Sala - Artist

Dion Mertzanidis - Artist

Jordan Duggan - Audio Engineer

Taylah Brown - UI/UX Designer
